channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The full list of Chase's The Edit properties is now available for Sapphire Reserve cardholders
item.description: Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders can now see a full list of properties in Chase's The Edit. Here's what travelers need to know for their next bookin...

item.title: Alaska Airlines announces start date for Rome flights; Atmos Rewards bookings now open
item.description: Alaska Airlines is now selling its first flights to Europe: Seattle service to Rome, beginning in April 2026.

item.title: Racing to Fiji: American Airlines vs. Cathay Pacific vs. Fiji Airways
item.description: In The Points Guy’s longest race yet, Nicky Kelvin and Liam Spencer attempt to fly from London to Fiji in opposite directions around the world.

item.title: Earn bonus points and miles: How to maximize shopping portals for Black Friday and holiday deals
item.description: Here's how to sign up for and use shopping portals for Black Friday and holiday purchases.

item.title: Is the Prime Visa credit card worth the cost?
item.description: This card is offering a great welcome bonus — but does that mean you should get it? We can help you decide.
